title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Taoiseach) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (taoiseach) order 2022

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 2. Charlotte Simpson, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Charlotte Simpson, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Taoiseach with effect from 21 March 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

26 April, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [216] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
